content.html: I am HOWLING. Gay sauna Pleasuredrome will be open on Monday but as a mark of respect WON'T be playing any music or showing porn, but WILL be screening the funeral. So you can get buggered in mournful silence, then watch HLMTQ go off to her reward. #ItsWhatSheWouldHaveWanted
